## PBScope.$query() method

Query the global variable by the name

**Signature:**

```typescript
$query(name: string): PBShaderExp;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | string | Name of the variable |

**Returns:**

[PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md)

The variable or null if not exists
